episode_summary: Haeyoung1 is a scintillating and optimistic woman who is preparing for her upcoming wedding. However, she is broken up by Taejin the day before her wedding, and her parents Deogi and Kyungsu are devastated to hear it. Haeyoung1 is an assistant manager of Product planning team. Sukyung who is Haeyoung1's superior in the team is cold-hearted and picky. Dokyung, who is a talented film sound director, starts having strange vision where he sees the future. Hun who is Dokyung's younger brother is in a relationship with Anna. Dokyung's best friend, Jinsang, conspired with Dokyung to ruin Haeyoung2's wedding by putting Taejin in a difficult situation. However, that wedding turned out to be not Haeyoung2's wedding but Haeyoung1's wedding. Through Heeran who is best friend of Haeyoung1, it was revealed that there are two individual named Haeyoung, and Dokyung feels guilty for hurting Haeyoung1 after discovering the fact. Haeyoung2 is Dokyung's ex-girlfriend who was planned to marry Dokyung, but she disappeared on the day of the wedding. Dokyung coincidentally encounters Haeyoung1 on the street again, just like the scene he had seen in his vision of the future.

Haeyoung1.occupation: assistant manager of product planning team

episode_summary: Dokyung keeps Haeyoung2 coming to his mind when he talks with Haeyoung1. Haeyoung1, who received a contact from the school reunion after a long time, wanted to attend but hesitated. The reason was because of Haeyoung2, who is a namesake. Haeyoung1 was constantly compared to Haeyoung2, who was beautiful and good at everything, throughout their school days, which made her worried about attending the reunion. However, Haeyoung2 did not show up at the reunion, and there were various rumors about her. Meanwhile, Dokyung kept receiving calls from an caller id restriction unknown number, and he instinctively realized it was from Haeyoung2, so he ignored the calls. Dokyung despised Haeyoung2, because she disappeared on the day of the wedding and didn't respond to any contacts. Dokyung spent the whole day searching for Haeyoung2 but couldn't find her, and was shocked when he saw a post on Haeyoung2's SNS saying, I hope only good things happen from now on. Afterwards, Dokyung hears the news that Haeyoung2 is marrying Taejin. determined to seek revenge, Dokyung vows to sabotage Haeyoung2's marriage to Taejin and asks Chairman, an acquaintance, to withdraw the investment made to Taejin. In the aftermath of the Chairman's investment withdrawal, all the investors who had invested in Taejin withdrew their support, Taejin was accused of fraud. In an attempt to resolve the situation, Dokyung sent his close friend Jinsang to Taejin, but he was rejected. Meanwhile, Haeyoung1's parents, Deogi and Kyungsu, kicked her out of the house. Dokyung and Haeyoung1 coincidentally meet at a bar, and Haeyoung1 opens up to Dokyung about the accumulated sadness she has been feeling. Dokyung apologizes to Haeyoung1 and encourages her to live her life to the fullest. Subsequently, Haeyoung1 is kicked out of her house and moves to a new place. While sorting her belongings, she discovers a door at the wall that it leads to Dokyung's house, coming face to face with Dokyung.

Haeyoung1.occupation: assistant manager of product planning team

episode_qas.Question: Why does Dokyung keep thinking about Haeyoung2 when talking to Haeyoung1?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung keeps thinking about Haeyoung2 because she was his ex-fiancée who disappeared on their wedding day.

episode_qas.Question: What made Haeyoung1 hesitant to attend the school reunion?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 was hesitant to attend the school reunion because she was constantly compared to Haeyoung2, who was beautiful and good at everything, throughout their school days.

episode_qas.Question: What happened to Haeyoung2 at the school reunion?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung2 did not show up at the school reunion, and there were various rumors about her.

episode_qas.Question: Why does Dokyung ignore the calls from an unknown number with a caller ID restriction?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung ignores the calls because he instinctively realizes they are from Haeyoung2, whom he despises for disappearing on their wedding day.

episode_qas.Question: What did Dokyung do when he couldn't find Haeyoung2 after searching for her the whole day?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung was shocked when he saw a post on Haeyoung2's SNS saying, 'I hope only good things happen from now on.'

episode_qas.Question: What news does Dokyung hear about Haeyoung2?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung hears the news that Haeyoung2 is marrying Taejin.

episode_qas.Question: What does Dokyung do to sabotage Haeyoung2's marriage to Taejin?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung asks Chairman, an acquaintance, to withdraw the investment made to Taejin.

episode_qas.Question: What happens to Taejin after the Chairman's investment withdrawal?
episode_qas.Answer: After the Chairman's investment withdrawal, all the investors who had invested in Taejin withdrew their support, and Taejin was accused of fraud.

episode_qas.Question: Who does Dokyung send to Taejin to resolve the situation, and what is the outcome?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung sends his close friend Jinsang to Taejin, but he is rejected.

episode_qas.Question: What happens to Haeyoung1 after her parents kick her out of the house?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 moves to a new place after being kicked out of her house by her parents.

episode_qas.Question: What does Haeyoung1 discover while sorting her belongings in her new place?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 discovers a door in the wall that leads to Dokyung's house.

episode_qas.Question: What does Haeyoung1 tell Dokyung about her high school experience with Haeyoung2?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 tells Dokyung that she was hit on the head by a ball and fell down, and a male student called her 'regular Haeyoung', while referring to Haeyoung2 as 'pretty Haeyoung.'

episode_qas.Question: What does Dokyung do when he receives a call with a restricted caller ID while at the living room with Hun and Anna?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung refuses the call with the restricted caller ID, and Hun talks about Dokyung and Haeyoung2's broken engagement.

episode_qas.Question: What does Dokyung do after not finding Haeyoung2 on their wedding day?
episode_qas.Answer: Dokyung runs out of the hospital in search of Haeyoung2, who did not show up for their wedding.

episode_qas.Question: What does Jinsang encourage Dokyung to do regarding Taejin?
episode_qas.Answer: Jinsang encourages Dokyung to take revenge on Taejin by giving him alcohol.

episode_qas.Question: What do Haeyoung1's parents do with her belongings?

episode_qas.Question: What does Haeyoung1 tell Dokyung about her feelings when they meet at a bar?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 opens up to Dokyung about the accumulated sadness she has been feeling.

episode_qas.Question: How does Haeyoung1 end up in Dokyung's house?
episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 discovers a secret door while unpacking in her new place and goes through it to Dokyung's house, coming face to face with him.

episode_addqas.Question: What is the significance of Dokyung constantly thinking about Haeyoung2 while talking to Haeyoung1?
episode_addqas.Answer: Dokyung constantly thinking about Haeyoung2 while talking to Haeyoung1 suggests that he is still deeply affected by Haeyoung2's disappearance on their wedding day and may be subconsciously comparing Haeyoung1 to his ex-fiancée.

episode_addqas.Question: What prompted Dokyung to seek revenge on Taejin?
episode_addqas.Answer: Dokyung was prompted to seek revenge on Taejin after hearing the news that Haeyoung2, who had disappeared on their wedding day, was marrying Taejin.

episode_addqas.Question: What is the outcome of Dokyung asking Chairman Jang to withdraw his investment in Taejin?
episode_addqas.Answer: As a result of Dokyung asking Chairman Jang to withdraw his investment in Taejin, all the other investors who had invested in Taejin also withdrew their support, leading to Taejin being accused of fraud.

episode_addqas.Question: Why does Deogi tell Kyungsu to abandon Haeyoung1?
episode_addqas.Answer: Deogi likely tells Kyungsu to abandon Haeyoung1 because she is frustrated and embarrassed by Haeyoung1's broken engagement and wants to distance herself from her daughter's situation.

episode_addqas.Question: How do Haeyoung1 and Haeyoung2's experiences at the school reunion differ?
episode_addqas.Answer: While Haeyoung1 attends the school reunion despite her hesitation due to being constantly compared to Haeyoung2, Haeyoung2 does not show up at the reunion, and there are various rumors about her.

episode_addqas.Question: What are some of the key events that happen to Haeyoung1 in this episode?
episode_addqas.Answer: Some of the key events that happen to Haeyoung1 in this episode include being kicked out of her house by her parents, moving to a new place, and discovering a secret door that leads to Dokyung's house.

episode_addqas.Question: Given the discovery of the secret door between Haeyoung1 and Dokyung's houses, how might their relationship develop in future episodes?
episode_addqas.Answer: The discovery of the secret door between Haeyoung1 and Dokyung's houses may lead to more interactions and a closer relationship between them in future episodes, as they navigate their unexpected living situation and shared connection to Haeyoung2.

episode_addqas.Question: Do you think Dokyung's actions in seeking revenge on Taejin are justified or excessive?
episode_addqas.Answer: Dokyung's actions in seeking revenge on Taejin by sabotaging his business and investments may be seen as excessive and morally questionable, as he is causing significant harm to Taejin's livelihood and reputation based on his personal vendetta against Haeyoung2.

episode_addqas.Question: How does Haeyoung1 end up moving to a new place?
episode_addqas.Answer: Haeyoung1 ends up moving to a new place after her parents kick her out of the house, leaving her belongings outside with a letter saying they will throw them away.

episode_addqas.Question: Is it true that Dokyung refuses to answer calls from a restricted caller ID because he believes they are from Haeyoung2?
episode_addqas.Answer: Yes, it is true that Dokyung refuses to answer calls from a restricted caller ID because he instinctively realizes they are from Haeyoung2, whom he despises for disappearing on their wedding day.

episode_summary: Haeyoung1 moved into a house right next to Dokyung's house, and the landlord, without even speaking to Dokyung, converted the storage room next to Dokyung's into a room and rented it to Haeyoung1. Dokyung told Haeyoung1 to leave that room, but she refused. Afterwards, feeling upset, Haeyoung1 called Dokyung, but it was Dokyung's younger brother, Hun, who mistakenly answered the call thinking it was Haeyoung2, and he got angry at Haeyoung1. Dokyung learned about this and apologized to Haeyoung1. Haeyoung1 discovered that a reservation had been made at the restaurant where she was supposed to go with Taejin, but she went alone. Memories with Taejin at the restaurant overwhelmed Haeyoung1 with sadness. Later, she attended the school reunion, went to a club, and returned home. However, she lost her house key and waited for Dokyung to enter her house. Haeyoung1, who entered the house with Dokyung, started talking to him about her unfair school days when she was constantly compared to Haeyoung2 with the same name, and even about the story of breaking up on the day before the wedding. Dokyung also shared the story of the day of his wedding. Their shared pain became a great comfort to Haeyoung1. Worried about Haeyoung1 living alone, Dokyung continued to help her. While driving with Heeran after a long time, Haeyoung1 coincidentally encountered Haeyoung2, whom they spent their school days together with, as they passed by the marathon course.

Haeyoung1.occupation: assistant manager of product planning team

episode_qas.Answer: Haeyoung1 talks to Dokyung about her unfair school days when she was constantly compared to Haeyoung2 and about breaking up on the day before her wedding.

episode_addqas.Question: What is the significance of Haeyoung1 throwing her wedding album into the river?
episode_addqas.Answer: Haeyoung1 throwing her wedding album into the river symbolizes her letting go of the painful memories associated with her broken engagement and moving on from her past.

episode_summary: Upon seeing Haeyoung2, Haeyoung1 becomes melancholic and engages in meditation while recalling happy memories. The happy memories that come to Haeyoung1's mind are the moments when Dokyung helped her, and she smiles as she reminisces. Meanwhile, Dokyung feels lonely every time Haeyoung1 comes to his mind due to his premonition ability. By chance, Haeyoung1 meets Dokyung at a restaurant and they have a meal together. Haeyoung1 tells Dokyung that she saw Haeyoung2, which surprises Dokyung. Later in the evening, Haeyoung1 buys alcohol at a convenience store and ends up meeting Sukyung. They drink together at Sukyung's house. In the meantime, Haeyoung1 encounters Jinsang, who is shocked to learn that her name is Haeyoung. Through Jinsang, Haeyoung1 learns that Dokyung is Sukyung's younger brother. Next day, the brand Haeyoung1 is in charge of at work is being renewed by a new team, led by Haeyoung2, which leaves Haeyoung1 flustered. Dokyung is troubled because of Dokyung's mom, Jiya. Haeyoung1 knows this but pretends not to, and Dokyung catches her, making her feel sorry. While Dokyung is having a meal with Haeyoung1, he says something that makes her heart flutter. Haeyoung1 feels excited in that moment. Upon witnessing Anna and Hun running and embracing each other, Sukyung and Jinsang ask Haeyoung1 if she can do the same as Anna did, and without hesitation, she runs towards Dokyung who has just arrived home. Dokyung, who already knew the situation due to his premonition ability, contemplates whether to embrace the running Haeyoung. In the end, Dokyung tightly embraces Haeyoung1 and feels each other's heartbeats.

episode_summary: After hugging Dokyung, Haeyoung1 experiences an embarrassing incident and feels ashamed in front of Dokyung. Before going to bed, Dokyung recalls the incident and bursts into laughter. The next day, Dokyung gives Haeyoung1 a ride in his car to the subway station on their way to work. During the ride, Haeyoung1 asks Dokyung to buy her a meal as a way to thank him for making her laugh. Unable to let go of her lingering attachment to Dokyung, Haeyoung2, when Dokyung doesn't answer her phone call, contacts Dokyung's company and leaves a memo. However, Dokyung mistakenly thinks that the memo is from Haeyoung1 and sends her a text message to meet at a steakhouse in the evening. Dokyung encounter Haeyoung2 unexpectedly at the steakhouse and becomes angry. Dokyung takes Haeyoung1 to a different restaurant. Haeyoung1 learns that Haeyoung2 is Dokyung's ex-girlfriend who was planned to marry Dokyung. Subsequently, Haeyoung1 and Haeyoung2 attend a company dinner, where even their colleagues show more favor towards Haeyoung2 than Haeyoung1. Dokyung also attends the dinner with his coworkers and coincidentally meets Haeyoung1 and Haeyoung2 there. Haeyoung1 goes home with Dokyung, and seeing this, Haeyoung2 becomes filled with sadness. Haeyoung1 gradually develops feelings for Dokyung, and Dokyung himself worries that he might be growing fond of Haeyoung1.

Haeyoung1.occupation: assistant manager of product planning team

episode_summary: Deogi coincidentally meets Dokyung, who lives next door to Haeyoung1, and realizes that he is a decent man. Through Deogi, Dokyung learns that today is Haeyoung1's birthday and spends time with her. In the meantime, Haeyoung2 visits Dokyung's house, and they discuss what happened between them in the past. Haeyoung1 overhears the conversation between Dokyung and Haeyoung2 and gets angry, leaving the home. When Dokyung asks her to come back, Haeyoung1 happily returns home. Meanwhile, Chairman meets Haeyoung2 while having a meal with Jiya. Jiya reveals that she didn't want Haeyoung2 to marry Dokyung and gives her a recorded file from the day before their wedding, urging her to break up with Dokyung. After meeting Haeyoung2, Jiya tries to call Dokyung to inform him of this fact but ends up visiting his house instead. Outside Dokyung's house, Jiya encounters Sukyung and discusses the incident of the broken engagement between Dokyung and Haeyoung2. Dokyung listens to the recorded files at home and understands Haeyoung1's actions, taking care of her.

episode_summary: Grateful for Dokyung taking care of her, Haeyoung1 prepares a packed lunch as a token of appreciation. Dokyung feels extremely embarrassed about this, but he takes the packed lunch and eats it with his colleagues at work. That evening, Dokyung tells Haeyoung1 that he enjoyed the lunch, and she is delighted. Jinsang, seeing that things are going well between Dokyung and Haeyoung1, advises Dokyung to stop seeing her. Dokyung ponders over Jinsang's words, realizing that he might be right. The next day, Dokyung receives an email from Haeyoung2. The email contains details about what happened the day before the wedding and a recorded file of a conversation between Dokyung and Jiya. Jinsang tries to interfere to prevent Dokyung and Haeyoung1 from getting closer, but Haeyoung1 notices his intentions. Haeyoung1 confesses her feelings to Dokyung and tells him not to meet Haeyoung2. However, Dokyung's mind is in turmoil. The next morning, upon seeing that Dokyung has checked the email, Haeyoung2 sends him a text message. Dokyung's feeling of remorse toward Haeyoung2 grows. Haeyoung1, on her way home from work, sits at the bus stop, lost in thoughts of the past, when Taejin approaches her.

episode_summary: Haeyoung2, who met Dokyung, expresses her desire to at least be able to exchange greetings if they happen to meet on the street. Dokyung doesn't respond and gets lost in old memories. Meanwhile, Haeyoung1 is sitting at a bus stop after work when Taejin notices her and approaches. Haeyoung1 recognizes Taejin and they exchange greetings. After their encounter, Haeyoung1 gets lost in old memories. Dokyung worries about Haeyoung1 in that state and takes care of her by her side. Taejin's mother contacts Deogi and expresses her wish for Haeyoung1 and Taejin to meet again. Later, after discussing it, Deogi and Kyungsu advise Haeyoung1 to meet Taejin again, but it's only then that Haeyoung1 finally reveals the truth about the breakup to Deogi and Kyungsu. Upon hearing this truth, Deogi and Kyungsu break down in tears. Meanwhile, Dokyung, sensing through his premonition ability that Haeyoung1 is in danger, becomes worried and sets out to find her. Dokyung eventually finds Haeyoung1 and they have a conversation before going inside the house. Later, Dokyung, startled by the sound of a car accident through his premonition, seeks the assistance of Soontak, a psychiatrist.

episode_summary: Haeyoung1, thinking about her conversation with Dokyung from the previous day, becomes lost in her thoughts. She makes an effort to smile, hoping that it will improve her mood. During the dinner gathering that evening, Haeyoung1 takes the opportunity to express her grievances and confront Haeyoung2 about past injustices. Sukyung stops Haeyoung1 and Haeyoung2 for their argument. Sukyung and Haeyoung2 bring the intoxicated Haeyoung1 home but don't know her exact address, so they ask Dokyung to take her. Dokyung leaves intoxicated Haeyoung1 at a nearby hotel. Meanwhile, Deogi receives a phone call from Taejin's mother, and reveals the truth about the breakup between Haeyoung1 and Taejin. The next day, Haeyoung1 tells Dokyung that she plans to move out of her current house, and Dokyung feels disappointed. Sukyung eventually meets her former lover, persuaded by Jinsang, and returns home in a troubled state after getting drunk. Jinsang, too, is upset and drinks at home. Both Sukyung and Jinsang drink together to dispel their troubled minds. Taejin's mother informs Taejin that Deogi got angry, but Taejin ends up expressing his anger towards his own mother and goes to find Haeyoung1 to talk about what has happened. Haeyoung1 is shocked to hear this and returns home to tell Deogi and Kyungsu. Meanwhile, Dokyung, worried when Haeyoung1 doesn't come home, waits all night. The next day, Haeyoung1 invites Taejin to her house, and Dokyung goes to play table tennis with Haeyoung2. Dokyung meets Haeyoung2 to sort out their relationship and suggests they remain friends. After organizing his thoughts, Dokyung visits Haeyoung1's house to meet her, but instead encounters Taejin. This angers Dokyung, and he heads home. While on his way, he heard the sound of a car accident, just like before, and had an illusion. When he comes to his senses, Dokyung realizes he's back at his own house. Eventually, he visits psychiatrist Soontak, who tells him that he has identified the cause of his condition. On his way home, Dokyung meets Haeyoung1 and starts discussing Taejin, which leads to an argument. Dokyung and Haeyoung1 argue and then passionately kiss as they confirm each other's feelings.

episode_summary: After the kiss with Haeyoung1, Dokyung disconnects from his surroundings and goes somewhere to sort out his thoughts. Haeyoung1 waits for Dokyung's call for a few days. While waiting for Dokyung's call, Haeyoung1 receives a call from Taejin and agrees to have a meal together. Meanwhile, Soontak, the mental health counselor who was counseling Dokyung, visits him, sensing that something has happened. Soontak tells Dokyung, Dokyung, you are regretting a woman right before dying in a traffic accident in the future, and that woman is Haeyoung1. After hearing Soontak's words, Dokyung drinks alcohol with his mind occupied. On the other hand, Haeyoung1, who had promised to meet Taejin, keeps thinking about Dokyung and cancels the appointment. She meets Heeran and talks about the kiss with Dokyung. Heeran advises Haeyoung1 to wait, as Dokyung needs time to sort out his thoughts due to his personality. Unable to resist her feelings, Haeyoung1 visits Dokyung's house but returns in embarrassment. Hun, Dokyung's younger brother, shares a movie scenario he wrote with Anna and gains confidence. He hands it over to Heeran. Dokyung sees Heeran getting upset while reading Hun's scenario and gets into an argument with Hun at home regarding the movie scenario. Meanwhile, Sukyung feels embarrassed whenever she sees Jinsang and regrets what happened in the past. Dokyung leaves home and reminisces about old memories with his father. With his thoughts sorted out, Dokyung calls Haeyoung1 and suggests meeting up, expressing that he misses her. Haeyoung1 receives Dokyung's call and immediately heads out to meet him. Dokyung and Haeyoung1 meet and go to the seaside together, enjoying drinks and engaging in conversation at a restaurant near the beach. Later, as both of them become intoxicated, Haeyoung1 hints at staying at a motel, but Dokyung doesn't give in and takes Haeyoung1 home.

episode_summary: Dokyung and Haeyoung1, who returned to Seoul after their beach date, are smiling and happy. Taejin kneels in front of Haeyoung1's parents, Deogi and Kyungsu, and asks for forgiveness, but to no avail. Haeyoung2 learns from her coworkers that Taejin is the person who was going to marry Haeyoung1. When Taejin can't see Haeyoung1 at her company, he texts her and makes an appointment. After Dokyung knows that Haeyoung1 had made an appointment with Taejin, Dokyung asks Haeyoung1 to meet him first. Taejin, who had prepared flowers and gifts, was about to leave after giving those to Haeyoung1, but she saw Dokyung. Taejin approaches Dokyung, punches her, and asks, Did you ruin me on purpose because you like Haeyoung1? Taejin tells Haeyoung1 that the reason he failed was because of Dokyung. Haeyoung1 is shocked, thinking that all of this happened because of her Haeyoung2. Afterwards, Haeyoung1 visits Haeyoung2 and expresses her anger to Haeyoung2 for turning her life upside down. Heeran cries and apologizes to Haeyoung1 because she feels like the thing happened because of her. Jinsang and his colleagues go on a trip to the beach together to help Dokyung, who can't get his mind together. Haeyoung2 doesn't know why Haeyoung1 is angry at him. Haeyoung1 tells Deogi that she is Haeyoung2's scapegoat. Heeran meets with Hun to discuss the script Hun wrote and also talks about what Dokyung did. Dokyung sends Haeyoung1 a text message saying he's sorry. Haeyoung1 walks around her street dressed in different colors for a change. Dokyung goes to Haeyoung1 and says she is sorry, but Haeyoung1 doesn't like Dokyung who keeps saying sorry. Haeyoung1 tells Dokyung to kneel, but he just leaves. While having a meal with Haeyoung2 and the Chairman, Taejin came by and asked the Chairman if he withdrew his investment because of Dokyung. Haeyoung2 listens to Taejin and realizes the reason why Haeyoung1 was angry at her. Afterwards, Haeyoung2 goes to see Dokyung and tells him that she is grateful for thinking of her and that she loves him, but Dokyung leaves. Taejin also recalls what the Chairman and Haeyoung1 said and realizes that what Dokyung did was because of Haeyoung2. Dokyung learns that he will have a car accident in the future. Afterwards, Dokyung visits Soontack and tells him that he thinks it is right for things to end like this with Haeyoung1.

Haeyoung1.occupation: assistant manager of product planning team

However, there may also be opportunities for reconciliation or a change of heart, depending on how the characters navigate this difficult situation.

episode_summary: Haeyoung1 has been drinking since morning and is out of her mind. Haeyoung1 anonymously consults on the radio and curses Haeyoung2 and Dokyung, but accidentally mentions her real name. This incident spread online, and the real name even appeared in real-time Internet search terms. Jinsang asks Dokyung if he called Haeyoung1. Dokyung seemed unwilling to call Haeyoung1, but Jinsang persuaded Dokyung. Dokyung gathers courage and goes to Haeyoung1's house. At the same time, Haeyoung1 looks at her phone hoping to see a call from Dokyung, but turns off the phone when she sees no record. At the same time, Dokyung calls Haeyoung1, but Haeyoung1's phone is already turned off. Sukyung falls off her seat while dozing off on the bus and is embarrassed, and Jinsang looks surprised. Sukyung, who got off the bus with Jinsang, said that Jinsang looked at Sukyung in amazement as she fell. Sukyung fainted while arguing with Jinsang. The hospital test results reveal that Sukyung is pregnant, and Jinsang congratulates Sukyung on her pregnancy. Sukyung despairs as he remembers his night with Jinsang. Haeyoung1 goes to Dokyung and confesses her feelings, but Dokyung pushes Haeyoung1 out of guilt. The Chairman's daughter hurled harsh words at Jiya, and Dokyung, who was watching, shouted at the Chairman's daughter to apologize to Jiya. Her wedding is ruined and Jiya blames it on Dokyung, but Dokyung gets angry at Jiya, saying he hated her mom revealing her money and not her mom having no money. Dokyung sees a future where he is reminded of Haeyoung1 even when he gets into a car accident and is on the verge of death. Dokyung then calls Soontak and says something that hints at his confidence in Haeyoung1.

episode_addqas.Question: How do Dokyung and Haeyoung1's attempts to contact each other differ in their timing and outcome?
